name: Prototype B
description:
OK! App

This wellbeing app provides a system that should help people track their physical and/or mental wellbeing and encourage them to care for their bodies and minds and their eating habits.

Estimated time for users to test and fill the questionnaire: 7 - 10 minutes

What to test

Through A/B testing, you are going to test the home page of OK! App. Therefore, other functions of this app are disabled.

For a better experience, please use your laptop.

Task

Check out the activity named “5-minute bedtime story”.

It is your choice to explore all the activities or not. Stop whenever you feel like it.

Please check out each activity ONCE. Otherwise, you will be navigated to the first page and you should take the same steps again.

What to do after the test

Please fill the following questionnaire according to your experience. 

Click here to view the questionnaire

Thank you for your time!
